references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of open-world object detection (OWOD), a core topic of the current research.

references.paper_title: CAT: Localization and identification cascade detection transformer for open-world object detection
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel method for OWOD using a transformer-based architecture, which is highly relevant to the current research.
This paper revisits and improves on existing methods for OWOD, providing valuable insights for the current research.
This paper introduces a novel transformer-based approach for OWOD, contributing significantly to the development of the field.
This paper introduces a method for open-vocabulary object detection, a related and important area to OWOD that contributes to the overall understanding of the research.
